description: The Male Judge, Type-6 emoji is a sequence of the  Man,  Emoji Modifier Fitzpatrick Type-6, ? Scales and ? Variation Selector-16 emojis.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the dark skin tone man judge emoji stands with an authoritative yet fair presence, clad in traditional judicial robes. Apple's detailed 3D rendering brings a sense of gravitas, with realistic lighting highlighting the folds of his attire and the stern, thoughtful expression on his face. This emoji represents justice, law, fairness, or the act of making a judgment, conveying impartiality and authority.
